title: LEGENDARY SNOWBALL START TIME
body:
https://twitter.com/RiotKateyKhaos/status/679466644792455168
tweet from official rioter states that this event will start at 6PM (once converted to OCE time). Unfortunately from threads i have read,
Riot isn't allowing anyone to receive a mystery skin before this time, despite the fact that the official website for LoL OCE purely says that the event begins on the 23/12. This implies that it should be available at 00:00. unfortunately not...that si the time for NA. Wanted to get this out so that people stopped getting ripped off by Rito.

replies.body: omg I purchased Galaxy Rumble, then got Spirit Guard Udyr  Pulsefire Ezreal and the new gragas skin :D

It starts at 19:00 AEDT on December 23. We messed up with the time showing on the website.

If you purchased a legendary or ultimate skin between 00:01 and 19:00 AEDT on the 23rd can you please contact support.

Really sorry about this!

Confirmed working.
Purchased DT Trist got Spirit Fire Brand
Purchased OS Teemo got Gentleman Cho'Gath got Red Riding Annie
